content: parallel with the same amount you started the pattern working yarn on back needle using a with darning needle insert needle into first stitch on front needle as if to purl pull yarn foot through leaving stitch on needle insert needle into first stitch on back needle as if foot k to first marker work heritage motif to knit leaving stitch on needle to second marker k to end of row step 1 insert needle into first stitch on work in pattern until foot measures 7 8 front needle as if to knit removing stitch 9 or until 2 less than desired length from needle ending with an even row page 4 ©rachel nutting woodland yarn co 2018 \heritage sock/ step 2 insert needle into next stitch on repeat the above steps until all stitches front needle as if to purl leaving stitch on have been removed from needles ending needle with step 1 and 3 use the darning needle to adjust the gauge of the newly created step 3 insert needle into first stitch on back stitches needle as if to purl removing the stitch from needle weave in ends and block step 4 insert needle into next stitch on enjoy back needle as if to knit leaving the stitch on needle heritage motif row 1 p2 1rc p2 k3 k2tog k1 yo p2 yo k1 ssk k3 p2 1rc p2 row 2 and all even row p2 k3 p2 k6 p2 k6 p2 k3 p2 row 3 p2 k3 p2 k2 k2tog k1 yo k1 p2 k1 yo k1 ssk k2 p2 k3 p2 row 5 p2 1rc p2 k1 k2tog k1 yo k2 p2 k2 yo k1 ssk k1 p2 1rc p2 row 7 p2 k3 p2 k2tog k1 yo k3 p2 k3 yo k1 ssk p2 k3 p2 end on row 8 page 5 ©rachel nutting woodland yarn co 2018 \heritage sock/ heritage motif chart g g h h h g g h h h h h h g g h h h h h h g g h h h g g 8 g g h h h g g s h j h h h g g h h h j h d g g h h h g g 7 g g h h h g g h h h h h h g g h h h h h h g g h h h g g 6 g g d g g h s h j h h g g h h j h d h g g d g g 5 g g h h h g g h h h h h h g g h h h h h h g g h h h g g 4 g g h h h g g h h s h j h g g h j h d h h g g h h h g g 3 g g h h h g g h h h h
